Razor Claw had been tracking three scents for days. he finally caught up an=
d could see his prey. He had already condemned the three as deserters and d=
ecided to give them a proper Predacon trial. That is let them have thier sa=
y then sentence them to death. He continued to follow from a distance waiti=
ng to see what they'll do next.

::Optimus Prime/Eclipse/Wolvertiron/Ramus:=
:
 
    Still weak from being reborn, again, he got up. He was too weak to =
transform, but he would be able to shortly. Unfortunatly he remember all he=
 had done as Dark Prime.
    He started back towards the Cybertronian Fire,=
 hoping to find some help.
    Suddenly three transformers came at him, he =
pulled his sword. They all looked at him.
    "It really is you," One said,=
 it was a great silver wolf. Then it transformed. It was halfway between ro=
bot and wolf it seemed. "I am Eclipse, this is Wolveritron, and this is Ram=
us. We want to help you, Optimus."


The Raptor sees the three meet with th=
e new bot. He was a good deal taller than they were but in his experience s=
ize couldn't be used to intimidate. He stepped forward into the open confro=
nting the other bots. "You are charged with desertion and cowardice in a ba=
ttle situation, how do you plead? One thought quickly entered his mind, "Th=
ey'll plead on thier knees when I'm through."

He dismissed the thought kno=
wing that with four on one odds that surrender wasn't probable.
  ----- Ori=
ginal Message ----- 
  From: dachande 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent=
: Sunday, January 28, 2001 9:06 AM
  Subject: most of my characters


  ::M=
agmatron/Dachande/Battera/Jynx/Four Nightmares/Cerberus/Wolveritron/Eclipse=
/Ramus/Sea Clamp/Praetorian/Hakibuscon/Vukodlak::
   
      They all heard =
the voice, and saw the flash. Magmatron decided not to let it worry him, Pr=
ime would be destroyed.
   
  ::Wolveritron/Eclipse/Ramus::
   
      They =
decided to search out Optimus Prime, and see if they could help him.
   
  =
::Vukodlak::
   
      "No! The time draws nigh!"
   
  ::Hakibuscon::
   
=
      He was still wandering about, and he decided to look for Prime.
